ViewObject.Name: UserAreaCustAreaLookup
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT FFVV.FLEX_VALUE_MEANING AS AREA_CODE, FFVV.DESCRIPTION AS AREA_LABEL, FFVV.FLEX_VALUE_MEANING|| ' ' ||FFVV.DESCRIPTION AS AREA_SEARCH FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, APP_USER_AREA AUA, PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA PCA, APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUE_SETS FFV, APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES_VL FFVV WHERE FFVV.FLEX_VALUE = AC.ATTRIBUTE4 AND FFV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = FFVV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID AND FFV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME = 'FCSAR_TERRITORY_AREA' AND PCA.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID = :promoCustId AND NVL(AUA.USER_NAME,1) = ( SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM APP_USER_AREA AUA1 WHERE AUA1.USER_NAME = :userName) = 0 THEN NVL(AUA.USER_NAME,1) ELSE :userName END FROM DUAL ) AND AC.ATTRIBUTE3 IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUR.REGION_CODE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUR.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_REGION AUR WHERE AUR.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),AC.ATTRIBUTE3) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUR.REGION_CODE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUR.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_REGION AUR WHERE AUR.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND AC.ATTRIBUTE4 = CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM APP_USER_AREA AUA, APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC1 WHERE AC1.ATTRIBUTE4 = AUA.AREA_CODE AND AC1.ATTRIBUTE3 = AC.ATTRIBUTE3 AND NVL(AUA.USER_NAME,1) = ( SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM APP_USER_AREA AUA1 WHERE AUA1.USER_NAME = :userName) = 0 THEN NVL(AUA.USER_NAME,1) ELSE :userName END FROM DUAL ) ) > 0 THEN AUA.AREA_CODE ELSE AC.ATTRIBUTE4 END AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCA.REGION_CODE IS NULL OR PCA.REGION_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE3 = PCA.REGION_CODE) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCA.LOC_CODE IS NULL OR PCA.LOC_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE5 = PCA.LOC_CODE) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCA.CUSTTYP_CODE IS NULL OR PCA.CUSTTYP_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE8 = PCA.CUSTTYP_CODE) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCA.CUSTGRP_CODE IS NULL OR PCA.CUSTGRP_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE1 = PCA.CUSTGRP_CODE) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCA.CUSTOMER_ID IS NULL OR PCA.CUSTOMER_ID = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.CUSTOMER_ID = PCA.CUSTOMER_ID)
